summary: Seasoned SAP FI/CO consultant with 7 years of professional experience, including 5 years in SAP consulting and 2 years in Banking and Financial Analysis. Currently with Infosys Limited in Sunnyvale, CA (since Oct 2010) as SAP FI/CO Consultant and Module Lead of a 40-member Global FI/CO Support and Maintenance team. Expertise includes end-to-end SAP FI/CO implementations, FI-CA (RMCA), Revenue Recognition, integration with SAP BW/EDW, and cross-functional work with MM and SD. Strong experience in requirements gathering, design documentation, configuration, testing, training, cutover, go-live and post-implementation support.

experience.title: SAP Consultant - SAP FI/CO
experience.description: Functional Consultant in SAP FI/CO for client. Involved in 5 project implementations; presently Module Lead of a 40-member Global FI/CO Support and Maintenance Team. Responsibilities include requirements gathering, design documentation, configuration coordination with ABAP resources, integration testing, end-user training and documentation, cutover, go-live and post-implementation support. Key areas: Payment Consolidation System, FI-CA (RMCA), Revenue Recognition, Journal Voucher Workflow, Balance Sheet Reconciliation, Production Support and Maintenance (GL, AR/AP, F110, Asset Accounting, AB-COPA, Special Purpose Ledger, Taxes, Vertex, Treasury, EBS, Collections and Dispute Management, FI-CA, Invoice Cockpit, Lockbox). Also involved in training and user manuals.

experience.title: Relationship Partner
experience.description: Acquisition of Small and Medium Enterprises (SME) clients with turnover up to INR 2500 Million. Provided end-to-end financial solutions covering Financial Markets, Trade and Treasury services, Corporate Finance, Asset Services and Term Loans. Analyzed financials and rated clients on financial and non-financial risk. Maintained portfolio quality through proactive account management and client interactions.

experience.title: Analyst
experience.description: Ensured accuracy of cash and stock transactions in client accounts; conducted in-depth analysis of exceptions; performed asset-level analysis of funds before NAV publication; prepared consolidated reports for high net worth clients.

experience.title: Associate
experience.description: Financial analysis of defaulted loans and approval for foreclosure; initiated and coordinated foreclosure processes; ensured timely completion of active foreclosures.
